string.value: I got my questionnarie from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

I gave Agent Falcon's Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to Jonas and had him fill it out. Finding him in the labyrinthine mansion was the hard part... Jonas was actually quite cooperative, especially for a spirit. In any case, I returned the completed form to Falcon, who was ecstatic that he didn't have to set foot inside the creepy old mansion again.
You've got the answers! Thank you, thank you! I'm so glad I don't have to set foot inside that creepy old house again--Er, I mean... now I can report these important findings to my superiors!
By the way, I found these black rocks in my smores firepit. I don't know what they do but here, you can take them!

Thanks again for all your help! The MBI is in your debt! Now, I can go home! Well, after I write up a Summary Report of Paranormal Investigations that is. Hmm, how long is this form... 672 pages?! *Sigh* These reports just get longer and longer. Guess I'll be here awhile...

That looks like an empty Paranormal Subject Questionnaire form you've got there... no luck finding ol' Jonas yet, huh? Don't give up! He's definitely somewhere in this house... I'm sure of it! The data doesn't lie!
